title: buckshot Pollock
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
##darkslategrey|take it from me
all this dead weight
@@                @@sinks you down
dig us up two shallow graves##

##darkslategrey|@@        @@take it from me
@@        @@so much heartache
@@                    @@who can bear it?
@@        @@dig us up some shallow graves##

##darkslategrey|misfortune has visited quite the shit-show
our pockets are linted with hope
to need something real
this pain that i feel
you can take it
from me##

##darkred|i'll show 'em.
i'll show 'em in paint
@@                @@my own, dark red,
i'll show 'em my buckshot pollock##

##darkred|@@        @@don't they see
@@        @@the splatter //en-sc√®ne//
@@                      @@my own, shot dead
@@        @@on the wall of my buckshot pollock##

##darkred|my heart is naught but the pain it imparts
my conscious the plunder for art
these tears, take them too
and my shit in the loo
and tell me what
you see##

##ghostwhite|confession
i haunt like a ghost
@@                @@it all slips through
since i gave all i am to the circus##

##ghostwhite|@@        @@my life
@@        @@haunts this sheet
@@                    @@a puppet for play
@@        @@as i gave up my life to the circus##

##ghostwhite|i sang and i wrote and i acted my part and
i wrung all the blood from the bone;
made the childhood abuse
and self hatred of use
and i'd never felt
so alone;##

##ghostwhite|don't.##

author: DolphinSlugchugger
